verses.verse: A Psalme for thankes geuynge. O be ioyfull in the Lorde (all ye landes) serue the Lorde with gladnes, and come before hys presence with a songe.
Be ye sure, that the Lorde he is God:
It is he that hath made vs, and not we oure selues: we are his people, and the shepe of his pasture.
O go youre waye into hys gates with thanckesgeuyng, and into his courtes wyth prayse: be thankfull vnto hym, and speake good of hys name.
For the Lorde is gracyous, hys mercy is euerlastynge, and his treuth endureth from generacion to generacion.
